overview.en: KKK is the general license of kuai3.io game center, game prize pool and all profits belong to all KKK holders. Kuai3. IO's mission is to provide the most fair and transparent games. All games use EOS blockchain HASH lottery, which ensures that the project side cannot influence the lottery result at the source. Currently, there are many games such as Kuai3 national version, Kuai3 extreme speed version, K3 Lotto, K3 Dice and so on.
